snippet: Despite the media hype surrounding Tim Tebow, even the quarterback knew the defense, which placed three Broncos on the Pro Bowl, was the main reason the team was winning.
abstract: Denver Broncos defense is the main reason the team has had a winning season, despite the hype surrounding quarterback Tim Tebow, who acknowledges as much.
lead_paragraph: Despite the media hype surrounding Tim Tebow, even the quarterback knew the defense, which placed three Broncos on the Pro Bowl, was the main reason the team was winning.

headline.seo: Defense Played a Big Role in the Broncos’ Rise
headline.main: Defense Had Big Role in Rise of the Broncos
headline.print_headline: Defense Played a Big Role in the Rise of the Broncos
